articles.author: Michael Acton
articles.title: Arm shares soar by more than 60% as AI demand boosts revenues - Financial Times
articles.description: SoftBank-backed UK chip designer beats Wall Street expectations in latest earnings report
articles.content:
Shares in Arm rocketed by more than 60 per cent on Thursday after the UK chip designer reported higher revenues boosted by strong demand for artificial intelligence.

articles.description: Prices of products shipped overseas have been falling at the fastest rate since 2008 crisis
articles.content: Global investors expect falling prices in China to push down inflation rates worldwide this year, as excess capacity in its slowing economy prompts Chinese exporters to cut prices on goods they sell … [+4748 chars]
